Para Santos el objetivo es tener un negocio fuerte, libre de deudas y tener salud para poder trabajar por un buen tiempo más.
texts.en:
Santos lives with her 39 year-old son and two grandchildren.  Her business is selling tortillas, tamales, traditional food.  She has owned her tortilla bakery for 20 years.  This business is the source of income with which she supports her family.  She works from 9.00am to 6.00pm.

Santos is requesting a loan to buy corn, gas, chicken, condiments, beans, rice and cheese so that she can make her products for her customers.  This will help her to have available everything that she needs and she will be able to meet demand.

Santos' goal is to have a strong business, free of debts, and to enjoy good health so that she can keep on working for a good time yet.

loans.use: to buy corn, gas, chicken, condiments, beans, rice and cheese

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes, vive con su esposo, no tienen hijos, administra una tienda, que la posee desD. hace 15 años, esta es su propia fuente D. ingreso, el horario D. venta es D. 4:00am a 8:00pm.
Ella quiere reforzar el inventario del negocio, comprando productos básicos, por lo que solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en frijoles, arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos y detergentes, surtiendo el negocio, considera que tendrá mejores ventas y atenderá mejor a los clientes.
El objetivo D. ella es trabajar fuertemente y con el apoyo D. financiamientos alcanzar el desarrollo en el comercio, así mismo cubrir todos sus gastos.
texts.en:
Mercedes lives with her husband.  They do not have any children.  Mercedes runs a store which she has owned for 15 years.  This is her own source of income.  She works from 4.00am to 8.00pm.

Mercedes would like to strengthen her business inventory, buying basic household products.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan that she will invest in beans, rice, sugar, bread, eggs and detergents in order to stock her business.  She believes that she will be able to make better sales and better serve her customers.

Mercedes' goal is to work hard and, with the support of loans, make progress in her business.  She would like to be able to cover all her expenses.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, bread, eggs and detergents

loans.name: Marcosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marcosa; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha (bebida a base de maíz) y venta de papa, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de papa y venta de chicha. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papa e insumos para preparar la chicha.                                          
                           
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marcosa belongs to the Munay Tika Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Marcosa, age 44, is married and has six children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling “chicha” (a corn based drink) and selling potatoes.  She sells in an itinerant manner from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  It is through these small businesses that she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand the business of selling potatoes and selling chicha.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes in order to make "chicha" (a corn based drink).

loans.name: Ana Betty

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 19, 8 y 6 años D. edad, estudian y son dependientes, Ana se dedica a la venta D. tortillas, aprendió la elaboración D. tortillas cuando aún era soltera,  e instalo el negocio por necesidad desD. hace 4 años, el horario es D. 9:00am a 3:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo, pues quiere comprarse maíz, una plancha industrial y leña, con esta compra estará beneficiada porque adquirirá por mayor el maíz y pues la plancha le ayudara para el cocimiento del producto. 
El objetivo D. Ana es trabajar por sus hijos, para que puedan estudiar y superarse.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband and their three children; ages 19, 8, and 6.  They children go to school, and they are dependents.  Ana sells tortillas.   She learned how to make tortillas when she was single.  Four years ago she set up her business out of necessity.  Her schedule is from 9:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m.

She is requesting a loan to buy corn, an industrial griddle, and firewood.  This purchase will be beneficial because she will get the corn wholesale.  The griddle will help her cook the product.  

Ana’s objective is to work for her children in order for them to be able to go to school and be successful.

loans.use: to buy corn, and industrial griddle, and firewood.

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Renee; el tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también trabaja en construcción civil, y el negocio de tienda de abarrotes lo realiza su esposa y él hace trabajos de construcción como casas y edificios, el socio quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes y mejorar en su trabajo de construcción. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, leche y golosinas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Renee belongs to the Munay Tika Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Renee, age 30, has a life partner and five children.  He alternates his daily activities with his grocery store business.  He also works in the building industry.  His wife runs the grocery store, and he does his construction work such as working on houses and buildings.

He wants to expand the grocery store and improve his construction work.  He is requesting the loan to buy products like rice, sugar, milk, and sweets for his grocery store.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy products like rice, sugar, milk, and sweets for his grocery store.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus -Chupaca Group

texts.es:
L. señora Carmen María es socia D. L. alcancia comunal D. divino niño jesus, D. 56 años D. edad vive en L. zona rural D. L. provincia D. Chupaca, L. socia es casada tiene 2 hijos, Marcos  D. 18 años en L. universidad y Carlos D. 12 años D. edad en L. etapa escolar, quienes le ayudan a su madre en L. preparación D. los diferentes platos típicos, en horas D. L. mañana preparan los platos como el puchero, L. quinua a tamalada, chicharon colorado, picante D. cuy y D. refresco L. chica D. ccora que es preparada a base D. 7 semillas, su esposo trabaja independientemente pero ayuda con el aporte en el hogar siendo necesario que Carmen venda comida para solventar los gastos D. L. universidad. El préstamo es para L. compra D. víveres y sillas para el negocio. L. socia esta ubicada al centro del grupo con chompa color rosada 
El Préstamo es  D. s/. 1000.00 Nuevo Soles
texts.en:
Carmen Maria is a member of the Divino Niño Jesus Communal Bank.  She is 56, and she lives in a rural zone in the Chupaca province.  She is married and has two children.  Marcos is 18, and he attends the university.  Carlos is 12 and in school.  They help their mother prepare different typical dishes.

In the morning they prepare the dishes like stew, quinoa “atamalada” (boiled potato cubes, milk, cheese cubes, salt and finely chopped fresh herbs), “chicharon colorado” (a pork and potato dish), “picante D. cuy” (guinea pig in a spicy sauce), and “chicha D. jora” (a corn based drink), which is maD. from a base of seven grains.

Her husband works independently, but he helps her with the household expenses.  He needs to do this because Carmen sells food in order to pay the university expenses.

The loan is to buy supplies and chairs for the business.  

Carmen appears in the photo with a pink sweater in the center of the group.  Her loan is for 1,000 soles.

loans.use: to sell typical food dishes in the area.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vitamins, antibiotics,analgesics, and injections to sell.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Tomasa; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de granos secos y de granos remojados como lentejas, quinua y moraya,ella vende en el distrito de Ollantaytambo que queda a 20 minutos del distrito de Urubamba, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de granos secos y de granos remojados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar quinua, lentejas, trigo y moraya al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tomasa is a member of the village bank MUNAY TIKA in Urubamba, a town in the Urubamba province of the department of Cusco.

Tomasa is 35 years old and lives with her partner and her four children. She has a business selling dried and rehydrated grains and pulses like lentils, quinoa, and potatoes. She sells her products in Ollantaytambo, 20 minutes away from Urubamba, from 6 a.m. to 1 p.m. She hopes that this business will allow her to help her children have better lives, and would like to expand it. She's requesting this loan in order to buy quinoa, lentils, wheat, and dried potatoes in bulk.

Tomasa is very happy about this loan and promises to pay it off in full.

loans.use: to purchase quinoa, lentils, wheat, and dried potatoes in bulk.

loans.name: Saul Ernesto

texts.es:
Saúl, vive con su esposa, tienen dos hijos de 14 y 19 años de edad, él se dedica a la reparación de bicicletas, este negocio surge por la necesidad de cubrir las necesidades del hogar, el aprendió joven a reparar las bicicletas por tal motivo decidió instalar el taller. 
Él necesita por el momento repuesto para bicicletas, por lo que solicita un préstamo para adquirir maniubros, frenos, rayos, pedales, asientos y forros, ya que se le agotan y quiere estar preparado para realizar reparaciones de forma rápida.
Su objetivo es potenciar el taller, que sea más rentable y mantener esta fuente de ingreso para su familia.
texts.en:
Saúl lives with his wife and their two children, who are 14 and 19 years old. He has a bicycle repair workshop, which he started in order to be able to support his family. He learned to fix bicycles when he was young and decided to set up a workshop.
At the moment, he needs bicycle parts, and is requesting this loan in order to purchase gears, brakes, spokes, pedals, seats, and tires, since his supplies are running low and he wants to be ready to make repairs quickly.
He'd like to expand his workshop, making it more lucrative and maintaining this source of income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase gears, brakes, spokes, pedals, seats, and tires.

loans.name: Las Estrellitas De Carabayllo Group

texts.es: La señora Meri Carmen F., integra el Grupo "Las Estrellitas D. Carabayllo",  Meri Carmen, tiene 27 años D. edad es soltera y tiene un hijo desD. joven siempre le ha gustado trabajar para ayudar a su familia, actualmente se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza (cosmeticos).  Inicio en este negocio por intermedio D. una vecina que le vendia a ella y la animo para que pueda vender. Su deseo adorado como toda madre es poder ver a su hijo profesional pero a la vez ella desea poder tener una zapateria en donD. pueda vender diversidad D. calzados.  El prestamo lo invirtio para la compra D. productos D. belleza y stockearse ya que viene campaña por el dia del padre.
texts.en: Meri is 27 years old, single, and has one son. She's enjoyed working from a young age to help her family. At the moment, she works selling beauty products. She got into the business through a neighbor, who sold to her and encouraged her to begin selling. Like every mother, her fondest wish is to see her son grow up to be successful, but she'd also like to have a shoe store where she could sell all kinds of shoes. She is using this loan to purchase beauty products and restock, since she'll be selling more for Father's Day.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eulogia; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas como naranjas, plátanos, mandarinas y entre otras frutas, ella lo distribuye la fruta al por mayor en el mercado de Urubamba, la socia también tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra café y plátano y también lo vende en el distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eulogia is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Eulogia is 37 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling fruit such as oranges, bananas and mandarins.  She distributes her fruit wholesale in Urubamba market.  Eulogia also has a plot of land where she grows coffee and bananas which she sells in Urubamba district.  She would like to expand her fruit business and is requesting this loan to buy fruit wholesale.

Eulogia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fruit wholesale

loans.name: Ayudanos Señor 6 Group

texts.en:
Sandra is the coordinator of her group Ayudanos Señor 6 (Help Us Lord 6). Her group is located in the rural area surrounding La Romana, where it is common to see sugar cane fields around the communities. Sandra makes her home in a simple structure where she lives with her long-term partner and their two children. She is a very hardworking woman who is committed to her plans to change her family’s life and provide better living conditions, a better house, and a good education for her children. 

Sandra is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She runs a small business stand in her house and she will use her loan to purchase shoes, clothes, cosmetics, and accessories to sell. She plans to re-invest her profits into her business.

Sandra’s long-term goal is to improve her house and business with good savings and a stable source of income. With this loan and the blessing of God, she is very sure to do this.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothes, cosmetics, and accessories to sell

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Sonia; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de docente del nivel inicial, ella enseña a niños de 3,4 y 5 años de edad en el distrito de Urubamba, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar en su trabajo como profesora y también quiere terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como mayólicas, cemento y arena.
                                                                  
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Sonia is 28 years old, married, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her work as a teacher.  She teaches children aged 3, 4 and 5, in Urubamba district.  Through her work, Sonia gets her own children ahead in life.  She would like to improve in her work as a teacher and would also like to finish building her house.  She is requesting this loan to buy construction supplies such as 'maiolicas' (glazed, ceramic tiles), cement and sand.

Sonia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies such as 'maiolica' (glazed, ceramic tiles), cement and sand

loans.name: Elia

texts.es: Elia tiene 38 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace más de 20 años se dedica a agricultura y ganadería, sin embargo no le era suficiente, por ello optó hace 10 años tener un negocio adicional, que es la venta de leña, actividad que lo realiza dentro de los espacios de su casa. Para ello cuenta con una sierra eléctrica, para que pueda cortar los troncos de madera que compra y que luego son vendidos a sus vecinos o clientes que le solicitan. Es así como se gana la vida, permitiéndole tener los ingresos cada semana y con ello puede cubrir las necesidades de su familia; además puede invertir en las anteriores actividades, como la agricultura y ganadería, pero por el momento desea incrementar de más leña para vender, por ello pide de su ayuda para que pueda continuar con su trabajo. Este será  su crédito número 3 con MFP, eso la motivará a esforzarse más en sus ventas y tener seguridad el tener un respaldo financiero, por ello se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito solicitado, invertirá en la compra de más troncos de madera.
texts.en:
Elia, 38 years old, lives with her three children in her own house.  For over 20 years she has been farming and working with livestock.  However, this was not enough for her.  Ten years ago she opted to have an additional business selling firewood.  She does this in the space behind her her house.  

To do this she has an electric saw so that she is able to cut the wood logs that she buys.  She then sells them to her neighbors or to customers who request them.  That is how she earns a living, which allows her to have income every week.  With this income she is able to cover the family necessities.  She is also able to invest in her business activities mentioned above like farming and livestock.

Now she wishes to have more firewood to sell.  That is why she is asking for your help to be able to continue working.  This will be her third loan with MFP.  This will encourage her to work more in her sales, and it will give her the security of financial support.  She pledges to make her payments on time.  She will use the requested loan to buy more wood logs.

loans.use: to buy wood logs.

loans.name: Biviana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Biviana; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también en su tienda de abarrotes vende verduras como cebollas, tomates, zanahorias, papa entre otras verduras, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche al por mayor y también para comprar verduras.
                                                                
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Biviana, 50, is a member of the “MUNAY TIKA” communal bank which is located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province and Cusco Department. 

She is married and has four children.  She alternates her daily chores with a grocery store where she also sells vegetables like onions, tomatoes, carrots and potatoes, among other vegetables.  She works from 6am until 10pm and supports her children with this work.  She wants to expand the grocery store and is asking for a loan to buy stock items for it like: rice, sugar, oil and milk at wholesale and also to buy vegetables.

She is happy about the loan and commits to pay her installments.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Kattia Maria

texts.es:
Kattia María M. Q., tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera ella  vive con sus dos hijos menores de edad, la señora tuvo que abandonar la secundaria por motivo de que tenía que trabajar para generar ingresos en su hogar, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable.
La señora ha sido clienta de fundación en dos ocasiones ella en los anteriores ha mantenido una excelente moral de pago, los crédito anteriores también fueron para fortalecer su capital de trabajo
Con este crédito la señora Kattia piensa invertir en la compra de mercadería para su peluquería, ya que viene días festivos del año y necesita tener surtido su negocio
La señora tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse al negocio, ella tiene una peluquería ella empezó con haciendo manicure y poco a poco fue capacitándose en belleza,  tiene una peluquería en San José centro, desde hace mas de  15 años alquila el local, donde se encuentra ubicado es un buen punto.
Kattia nos cuenta que se levanta temprano, hace las labores domesticas, y después se va a trabajar y regresa hasta las siete de la noche, hace la cena y les ayuda a sus hijos a ser la tarea, sus hijos se los cuida su mamá, Kattia nos cuenta que ella desea tener un carro para transportarse a su negocio.
Con este crédito la señora podrá tener más capital de trabajo para fortalecer su negocio y poder cumplir su objetivo
texts.en:
Kattia María M. Q., 43, is a single mother living with her two minor children.  She had to drop out of secondary school because she had to earn money for her household.  She is a very hard working, responsible person.

She has been a client of the Fundación on two previous occasions and she kept an excellent payment behavior in both of them.  The past loans were also to strengthen her working capital.

Kattia wants to use this loan to buy merchandise for her beauty salon because annual holidays are approaching and she wants to have it well stocked.

She’s been in business for over 20 years.  She has a beauty salon.  She started out doing manicures and gradually trained in beauty.  She has had a beauty salon that she rents in downtown San José for over 15 years; it’s located in a good spot.

Kattia tells us that she rises early, does her domestic chores and then goes to work.  She returns home at 7pm, prepares dinner and helps her children with their homework.  Her mother babysits the children.  Kattia tells us that she’d like to have a car to get to work.  With this loan, she’ll have more working capital to strengthen her business and meet her objective.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Mariposas Group

texts.es:
Las Mariposas es un grupo solidario de Credituyo compuesto por 8 mujeres que esta en su primer ciclo.  Ellas pusieron este nombre al grupo simple y sencillamente, porque les gustan las mariposas. La mayoria de las mujeres de este grupo son comerciantes y se dedican a la venta de diversos productos como ropa, zapatos,  perfumes, joyas, y snacks.
 
Aurelia es una de las integrantes del grupo. La señora Aurelia tiene 66 años y 5 hijos. Todos sus hijos son trabajadores y trabajan como albañiles, en talleres mecanicos y como secretarias. Aurelia solia tener un puesto de hamburguesas que administraba junto con su esposo. Sin embargo, su esposo falleció recientemente y mantener el negocio abierto fue muy complicado para ella sola, sobre todo a causa de su diabetes. Es por eso que Aurelia decidió habilitar un cuarto de su casa para comenzar alli un negocio de snacks. En este actualmente solo vende tostadas, duritos y bollos (freezy pops). Con su crédito quiere comprar una olla electrica para derretir queso asi como los insumos necesarios para comenzar a vender nachos con queso así como otras frituras y botanas que son preparadas comunmente con queso derretido en la región.
texts.en:
Las Mariposas (The Butterflies) is a communal bank in Credituyo composed of 8 women; it’s in its first cycle.  They chose this simple name simply because they like butterflies.  Most of the women in this group are merchants and sell a variety of products like clothes, shoes, perfume, jewelry and snacks.

Aurelia is one of the members of the group.  She is 66 years old and has 5 children.  All her children work; some as bricklayers, others work in repair shops and as secretaries.  Aurelia used to have a hamburger stand that she ran with her husband.  However, her husband passed away recently and keeping the business going by herself was very difficult for her, especially because of her diabetes.

Because of this, Aurelia decided to refurbish a room in her house to start selling snacks.  Currently she only sells tostadas, duritos (crispy fried dough) and bollos (freezy pops).  She wants to use the loan to buy an electric pot to melt cheese as well as the necessary ingredients to start selling nachos with cheese and other fried food items and regional snacks that are commonly made with melted cheese.

loans.use: to buy utensils and merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintaining her sewing machines.

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es:
María, es casada, vive con su esposo y una hija la cual es enfermera, se dedica a la agricultura, desD. hace 11 años junto a su esposo trabajan sembrando maíz y frijol, cultivan una parte en terreno propio y otra parte alquilan.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento para plagas, esta inversión le ayudara para iniciar  la siembra con todos los cuidados necesarios, con la esperanza D. lograr una buena cosecha.
Para María como cada año, su objetivo es tener una buena siembra, cultivar y producir, tiene también el proyecto D. arreglar su vivienda pero dentro D. algún tiempo.
texts.en:
María is married living with her husband and a daughter who is a nurse.  She is a farmer.  For the last 11 years she and her husband have worked planting corn and beans.  They grow part of it on their own field and another part on leased land.

She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, manure and insecticiD..  This investment will help her start the planting with all necessary care hoping to get a good crop yield.

For María, like every year, her goal is to attain a good planting, to cultivate and to produce.  She also has a project involving home repairs but that’s for a little later on.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Xiomara Yeskeli

texts.es:
Xiomara, es madre de tres hijos de 5, 9 y 12 años, vive con su esposo y se dedica a la venta de pupusas, administra una tienda, también vende frutas en una escuela y su esposo es agricultor, actualmente él iniciara la siembra de maíz, para ello necesita comprar abono y fertilizantes.
Xiomara solicita el préstamo que dará uso el esposo comprando los insumos que necesita para el cultivo, pagando mano de obra para preparar la tierra.
El objetivo de ella es tener una fuente de ingreso más por eso apoya a su esposo en el área agrícola, ya que juntos velan por las necesidades de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Xiomara is the mother of three children who are 5, 9 and 12 years old.  She lives with her husband and sells “pupusas” (typical Salvadoran fast food), runs a store and also sells fruit at a school.  Her husband’s a farmer.  He is about to start the new corn planting and needs to buy manure and fertilizer.

Xiomara is asking for the loan that she’ll give to her husband for the necessary supplies he needs for the crops and to pay labor costs to prepare the soil.

Her goal is to have another source of income and that’s why she helps out her husband in the agricultural area because they watch over their children’s needs together.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer and also to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Silvia Carmelina

texts.es:
Silvia, está casada, vive con dos hijos D. 19 y 23 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad, tiene 6 años D. tener el negocio y lo fundó junto a sus hijos, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 7:00pm.
Ella actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar arroz, frijol, azúcar, aceite, huevos, embutidos y pastas. Esta compra le ayudara para abastecer el negocio y mantener a disponibilidad D. los clientes.
El objetivo D. Silvia es mantener el negocio para ayudar a su familia D. las ganancias que recibe, pues quiere para sus hijos un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Silvia is married and lives with two children who are 19 and 23 years of age.  She sells basic need items and has been in business for six years.  She started the business with her children and is open from 6am until 7pm.

She currently needs a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, cured meats and pasta.  This purchase will help her stock the store and have supplies on hand for her customers.

Silvia’s goal is to stay in business to help her family with the profits she earns because she wants her children to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, cured meats and pasta.

loans.name: Mujeres De Villa Paraiso 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Luz is the coordinator of her group Mujeres de Villa Paraiso (Women of Village Paradise) 1 & 2. Her group is located in one of the neighborhoods of Los Alcarrizos, a community to the northwest of Santo Domingo.

Luz makes her home here in a simple structure except for the rainy seasons. When it rains, her area gets flooded so her most important challenge is to have a comfortable house in a better neighborhood. She lives with her husband and their two children.

Luz is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing beans, coconut, charcoal, sugar, milk, corn and other items. She sells traditional candies such as coconut and milk, sweet beans, Chaca (sweet corn with milk), and other items. Her business profits are to save and invest in her business.

Luz is dreaming to have a depot, where she could sell different products and goods. This is the future for her business, and she will work to make it come true with the Lord's will.

loans.use: to buy beans, coconut, charcoal, sugar, corn, etc.

loans.name: Edwin Antonio

texts.es:
Edwin, es soltero, vive con sus padres, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de estar cultivando aprendió de su padre, tiene un horario de 6:00am a 3:00pm, en esta jornada atiende todas las demandas del terreno.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como: abono, tratamientos para plagas, y fertilizantes, esta será una gran ayuda para Edwin, ya que al tener todo lo necesario podrá iniciar la siembra y dar un buen cuido.
Su objetivo es ayudar a sus padres, contribuir al desarrollo de su familia y forjar su futuro.
texts.en:
Edwin is single living with his parents.  He is a corn and bean farmer.  He’s been in this line of work for several years having learned it from his father.  His work schedule is 6am to 3pm and during this span of time he takes care of all the land’s needs.

He is asking for a loan to buy farming supplies like: manure, insecticide and fertilizer.  This will be of great help to Edwin because by having everything on hand he can initiate the planting and care for it properly.  

His goal is to help his parents, contribute to his family’s development and forge his future.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies like manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loans.name: Maria Isaura

texts.es:
María, tiene 41 años de edad, tiene tres hijos dos que aún viven con ella y uno que se caso, María tiene un negocio de venta de frutas, con este negocio ha logrado mantener el hogar, lo tiene desde hace 5 años, la fruta la vende en trosos ya en su bolsa, la ofrece de forma ambulante.
Actualmente necesita invertir en frutas, comprando mangos, sandia, jícama, pepino, ya que no dispone de muchas frutas en el puesto, este préstamo será una gran ayuda para ella y podrá ofrecer a los clientes frutas frescas.
Para María su único objetivo es tener una fuente de ingreso, que le permita cubrir las necesidades del hogar y sobre todo mantener a sus hijos en condiciones optimas para que estos puedan superarse.
texts.en:
María is 41 years old and has three children; two still live with her and one that’s already married.  María sells fruit.  She’s had the business for five years and it’s made it possible for her to support her home.  She is a street vendor and sells the fruit bagged and cut into pieces.

She currently needs to buy fruit: mangoes, watermelon, jícama and cucumber because she doesn’t have a lot of fruit available in her stand.  This loan will be of great help to her because she’ll be able to offer fresh fruit to her customers.

For María, her only goal is to have a source of income that will allow her to cover household needs and, above all, keep her children in optimal conditions so that they can improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy onions, tomatoes, potatoes, cauliflower and cabbage, as well as apples and papayas.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 17 y 4 años de edad, ella tiene un negocio de pupusas y artículos de primera necesidad, está ubicado en su casa de habitación, no tiene un horario de trabajo y lo administra desde hace 18 meses.
Actualmente María necesita comprar mercadería para el negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo para adquirir aceite, azúcar, embutidos, golosinas, gaseosas y  jabón, esto surge por la necesidad de fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer a los clientes lo más necesario en los hogares.
Para María el objetivo es contribuir al desarrollo de sus hijos, a través del esfuerzo que realiza cada día en su negocio.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children who are 17 and 4 years old.  She sells “pupusas” (typical Salvadoran fast food) and basic need items at home.  She does not have a fixed work schedule and she’s been running the business for the last 18 months.

Currently, María needs to buy merchandise for the business so is asking for a loan to buy oil, sugar, cured meats, snacks, soft drinks and soap.  This arises because of the need to strengthen the business and offer customers what they most need in their homes.

For María, the goal is to contribute to her children’s development through the daily effort she puts into her business.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, cured meats, snacks, soft drinks and soap.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es:
Reynaldo, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 25 y 20 años de edad, él tiene 11 años de trabajar en su propio taller de reparación de bicicletas, con este negocio ha logrado cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos, pues quiere fortalecer el inventario de su taller comprando pedales, asientos, forros, frenos, rayos, entre otros, que son parte de las bicicletas y que los clientes tienen la necesidad de reparar.
Las aspiraciones de Reynaldo es primeramente ver que sus hijos estén en buenas condiciones, proveer para su hogar todo lo necesario y que su negocio sea cada día más rentable.
texts.en:
Reynaldo lives with his wife and two children who are 25 and 20 years of age.  He’s been working for 11 years in his own bicycle repair shop.  This business has allowed him to cover household needs.

He is asking for a loan to buy spare parts because he wants to strengthen his shop’s inventory buying pedals, seats, covers, brakes and spokes, among others, which are bicycle parts that the customers need to have repaired.

Reynaldo’s goals are first to see that his children are in good state, to provide for his entire home’s needs and that his business is more profitable every day.

loans.use: to buy pedals, seats, covers, brakes and spokes.

loans.name: Clara Maribel

texts.es:
Clara, vive con su madre y dos hijos de 9 y 7 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de meriendas y tortillas, tiene varios años de estar dedicada al negocio, y es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta para cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
Clara solicita un préstamo para la compra ingredientes para preparar las meriendas, como pollo, carnes rojas, verduras, condimentos y maíz para las tortillas, con este préstamo solventara la necesidad de materiales para preparar las comidas diariamente.
El objetivo de ella es que como Madre, ver a sus hijas formados académicamente, poderle financiar sus estudios para que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Clara lives with her mother and two children who are 9 and 7 years of age.  She sells prepared meals and tortillas.  She’s been in this business for several years and it is the source of income she relies on to cover household needs.

Clara is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for her meal preparation like: chicken, red meats, vegetables, condiments and corn to make tortillas.  With this loan she will cover the need for supplies used in daily meal preparation.

Her goal as a mother is to see her children academically prepared, to be able to pay for their schooling so that they can do well in life.

loans.use: buy chicken, red meats, vegetables, condiments and corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Cruz De Espinas Group

texts.es:
Yaneth Felicia tiene 27 años de edad socia de la alcancía comunal Cruz de Espinas, es madre soltera su hijo de 4 años de edad, vive en la localidad de  Matahuasi  Huancayo, Yaneth desde muy pequeña quedaron huérfanos con su hermano César conflicto del Terror del Terrorismo en  Perú en los años 90, desde entonces de su niñez tuvieron que trabajar cuidando ganado ajeno de los vecinos de la zona, trabajaron y se esforzaron mucho y actualmente ya tienen sus propios ganados y desean incrementar para engorde. El Préstamo que solicita  es para la compra de Alimentos Balanceados para sus ganados vacunos. La socia esta en la segunda fila la cuarta persona lado derecha con chompa color morado. 
El Préstamo es de s/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles
texts.en:
Yaneth Felicia is 27 years old and a member of the “Cruz de Espinas” (Cross of Thorns) communal bank.  She is a single mother of a 4-year-old son.  She lives in Matahuasi, Huancayo. 

Yaneth and her brother César were orphaned while still very little due to the rampant terrorism in Perú in the 90s.  Since their childhood they had to work caring for cattle belonging to nearby neighbors.  They worked hard and put much effort into their work and they currently own cattle of their own.  They want to increase the size of their herd to raise and fatten up.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy nutritionally balanced cattle feed.  

She appears in the second row, fourth person on the right wearing a purple sweater.

The loan is for 500 new soles.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced cattle feed.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, vive con su familia, y tiene 6 años de estar dedicándose a la crianza y comercio de cerdos, con este negocio este cubriendo todas las necesidades de su hogar.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de concentrado y vacunas, con esta ayuda podrá velar por la salud de los cerdos y darles una buena alimentación, con la esperanza que le dé un mejor resultado la granja al comercializar los cerdos.
Su aspiración es crecer en el negocio, tener un buen número de cerdos en la granja y velar por todas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
José lives with his family and has worked raising and selling pigs for six years. He covers all of the household needs with this business. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of concentrated feed and vaccines and with this support, he will be able to watch over his pigs’ health and provide them with a good diet. As a result, he hopes that the pigs on his farm sell better.

His dream is for his business to grow, to have a good number of pigs on the farm, and to look out for their needs.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and vaccines for his pigs.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, es madre de familia, vive con dos hijos, es comerciante  desde hace 30 años, se dedica a la venta de  frutas, verduras y queso, tiene muchos años de estar en el negocio, lo aprendió por su familia la cual es comerciante.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra de verduras: zanahorias, papas, tomates, chiles, también fresas, uvas, bananos y naranjas, para fortalecer el negocio, esta idea es para ofrecer a los clientes una diversidad de frutos frescos, mejorando la condición del negocio.
Su aspiración es fortalecer el negocio, aumentar el comercio, con la esperanza de crecer cada día y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a mother and lives with her two children. She has been a merchant for 30 years and works sells fruit, vegetables and cheese. She has been in this business for a long time and learned the trade from her family, who are merchants.

She needs a loan for the purchase of vegetables like carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, and hot peppers, as well as fruits like strawberries, grapes, bananas and oranges in order to strengthen her business. The idea is to have a variety of fresh fruits to sell in order to improve the business.

Her dream is to strengthen her business and expand sales with the hope of growing on a daily basis and thus improving her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, hot peppers, strawberries, grapes and bananas.

loans.name: Maria Ysabel

texts.es:
Maria es una madre de familia de 28 años de edad, actualmente ella vive con sus 2 hijos menores de edad, ella vive en una zona rural del distrito del distrito de catacaos en el departamento de Piura.

Maria se dedica a la  comercialización de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y además de ovejas, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Piura y también realiza entregas en su domicilio. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 10 años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.

Maria está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado.  Además ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cría a sus  animales. 

Maria desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Maria is a 28 year-old mother who currently lives with her two young children.  She lives in a rural area in the Catacaos district in the department of Piura.

Maria's occupation is the business of small animals, various poultry and also sheep, which she raises in pens located in the back of her home.  This business sells in the market at Piura and also makes home deliveries.  She has been working in this business for more than 10 years, during which time she acquired experience in the field and established a customer base for her business.

Maria is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa of 1,500 New Soles to be able to buy animals along with with their respective animal feed.  In addition, she wants to make improvements to their pens to improve the environment in which she raises her animals.

Maria wants to improve her quality of life with effort and hard work. She has good work references, and people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy animals together with their respective animal feed.

loans.name: Maria Ermelinda

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, se dedica a la venta D. sopa D. puya, chilate y tamales, este negocio lo realiza en su propia casa, ofreciendo a sus amigos y vecinos, el negocio lo realiza desD. hace 12 años.
Ella necesita un préstamo e invertirlo en materiales para la preparación D. la venta como por ejemplo, verduras, condimentos, maíz, pollo, aceite, con esta compra mejorara la calidad D. su negocio, manteniendo todo lo necesario para continuar produciendo y vendiendo alimentos.
Lo que María espera es que su negocio aumente, sea más rentable para ayudar D. una mejor manera a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and two children and works selling tripe soup, ‘chilate’ (a Central American drink maD. from peppers, corn and cocoa) and tamales. She works from her house, selling to her friends and neighbors, and has been in this business for 12 years.

She needs a loan to invest in materials for preparing the food to sell, such as vegetables, condiments, corn, chicken and oil. She will improve the quality of her business with this purchase, having everything necessary to continue making and selling food.

María hopes that her business will increase and will be more profitable so that she can better help her children.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, corn, chicken and oil.

loans.name: Magaly

texts.es:
Magaly tiene 26 años de edad, ella vive con sus esposo,cuenta con casa propia, su vivienda está ubicada en un caserío llamado Sinchi Roca, en el distrito de Tambogrande, este caserío cuenta con los servicios básicos (agua y desagüe)y con grandes deseos de superación. 

Magaly cuenta con una bodega instalada en sus domicilio donde ofrece todo tipo de bebidas, la venta de cerveza es la que más salida tiene los fines de semana y además trabaja en la Municipalidad de Sinchi Roca, su esposo es agricultor y lo apoya en las actividades que realiza, existe una buena relación familiar. 

 Magaly está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar más cerveza y realizar unas mejoras en el local para brindar una mejor atención a su público y seguir creciendo en su actividad.

Magaly cuenta con muy buenas referencias, sus vecinos y amigos la consideran una mujer muy joven trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Magaly is 26 years old. She lives with her husband and has her own house. Her home is located in a village called Sinchi Roca in the district of Tambogrande. This village has basic services (water and sewage) and a great desire to excel.
Magaly has a store that she runs from her home where she offers all types of drinks. The beer sales are the greatest. She has the weekends and also work for the Sinchi Roca municipality. Her husband is a farmer and she helps him with his work. They have a good relationship.
Magaly is requesting a loan of $750 from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more beer and to make some improvements to her premises in order to give better service to her customers and to keep growing her business. 
Magaly has good references. Her neighbors and friends consider her to be a very hardworking and responsible young woman.

loans.use: to buy more beer and make some improvements to her premises.

loans.name: Sandra Yaneth

texts.es:
Sandra, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella venD. poleada y en donD. vive realiza costuras, ella sale a vender a las calles D. la ciudad D. las 7:00am en delante, también en sus momentos realiza costuras.

Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra D. ollas para el negocio y reparación del carretón donD. venD. las poleadas, con esta ayuda mejorara su actividad ya que con ollas nuevas podrá aumentar la producción y mejorar la calidad.

El objetivo D. ella  es construir su propia casa ya que actualmente está pagando cuotas D. un lote, donD. piensa en un futuro construir la vivienda.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her husband and son and works selling ‘poleada’ (vanilla custard) and also sews at her house.  She goes out to the city streets to sell starting at 7am and she also sews in her spare time.  

She currently needs a loan to buy pots for her business and to repair the cart from which she sells the poleadas.  With this support, she will improve her business as the new pots will help her to increase production and improve the quality of her food.

Her goal is to build her own house, as she is currently making payments for a lot where she plans to build it in the future.

loans.use: to buy pots for her business and to repair the cart she uses to sell custard.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, glue and formica.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
La señora Kattyusca Roció es socia de la alcancia comunal san isidro, tiene 30 años de edad vive en huari Huancayo Perú, tiene 2 hijos menores,  Mery de 6 años y Yermy de 1 año, la socia  siempre se dedicó a la confeccion de peluches artesanales, elaboradas con lanas y tejidos, su madre quien la enseñó a confeccionarlos y con el apoyo de su esposo Juan quien también lo ayuda a elaborar las lanas a hilos para los tejidos. y asi venden los peluches artezanales en las ferias dominicales,la socia logra mantener el hogar con sua ahorros, su esposo  se dedica exclusivamente a la venta de condimentos. El Préstamo es para la compra de pellejos (piel de anímales) para la producción de peluches Artesanales.La socia esta en la primera fila derecha con chompra rojo cuvierta con una tela artezanal hecha a tejidos coloridos y elegantes.  
El Préstamo es de s/. 600.00 Nuevo Soles
texts.en:
Kattyusca Rocío is a member of the “San Isidro” communal bank. She’s 30 years old and lives in Huari, Huancayo, Perú.  She has two minor children: Mery, 6 and Yermy, 1. 

She has always made artisanal stuffed toys from wool and fabric.  Her mother taught her how to make them and her husband, Juan, helps her too to change the yarn into fabric.  They sell their artisanal stuffed toys at the Sunday farmers markets.  She is able to support her home with her savings.  Her husband sells condiments exclusively. The loan is to buy animal pelts to use in the artisanal stuffed toy making.

She is in the first row on the right wearing a red sweater covered with colorful and elegant artisanal fabric.

The loan is for 600 new soles.

loans.use: to make stuffed toys.

loans.name: Rufino

texts.es:
Rufino, es soltero, vive junto a sus padres y una sobrina, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, a parte de este oficio es empleado de un comercial reconocido de motocicletas,  normalmente para la época de invierno cultiva siempre.
Hoy día se encuentra iniciando el proceso de cultivo, por lo que solicita un préstamo para la compra abono y fertilizantes,  esta compra le ayudara para tener todos los materiales necesarios e iniciar el cultivo.
Su objetivo es crecer en los cultivos, para ayudar a sus padres en los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Rufino is single and lives with his parents and a niece. He works growing corn and beans, but he is also employed by a renowned motorcycle company. Normally, he always farms during the winter months.

He is now beginning the farming process, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers. This purchase will help him to have all the necessary materials and to begin farming.

His goal is for his farming business to grow so that he can help his parents with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Nueva Gloria Group

texts.en:
America is the group coordinator of her group, Nueva Gloria 1 & 2. This group has 10 members. The group is based in Los Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town.

America runs a small business of selling cosmetics. She dedicates herself to selling hand and face creams, make-up, body lotion, and many other cosmetics. A friend told her about a very famous franchise for cosmetics and natural products, and she decided to sell those products. America is really excited to develop this business, which she will start with her first Esperanza loan. She wishes to repay her loan well and to continue receiving more loans. She is excited to receive her first loan with Esperanza. She wants to use her business profits to increase her inventory.

America has 4 children. Three of them live together in her simple house with their father. Her dreams are to have an improved and successful business, and also to build a house for her children. Her favorite things to do are to read and sew.

loans.use: to buy toothpaste, soap, hand and body lotion, and other cosmetics

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 46 años de edad, el es soltero, vive en un caserío llamado nuevo Anexo San Juan, del distrito de Mórrope a 40 minutos de la ciudad de chiclayo.

Se dedica ala comercialización de animales especialmente a la ganado ovino (ovejas), ganado caprino (cabritos) y caballos, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Lambayeque  y también realiza entregas en su domicilio. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace muchos años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.

Julio está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado.  Además ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cría a sus  animales. 

Julio desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias, las personas que lo conocen lo describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Julio is 46 years old and single. He lives in a village called Nuevo Anexo San Juan in the district of Mórrope, 40 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.
He works selling animals, especially sheep, goats, and horses, which he keeps in corrals behind his house. He sells his animals in the market at Lambayeque and he also delivers to people's homes. He has been doing this work for many years and has acquired a lot of experiences and has a loyal customer base. 
Julio is requesting a $750 loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy animals and their appropriate food. He also wants to make some improvements to his corrals to improve the environment in which his animals are raised.
Julio wants to improve his quality of life with his hard work and efforts. He has good references and the people who know him describe him as a calm and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy more animals and their food, and to make improvements to his corrals.

loans.name: Brayan Josue

texts.es:
Brayan, es empleado y comercializa ropa, vive con su esposa y una hija de 6 años, él trabaja todos los días de 2:00pm en delante en una funeraria, el demás tiempo lo dedica a vender ropa.
Actualmente necesita invertir en mercadería, comprando prendas de vestir casual, femenina y para niños, con esta inversión está en mejores condiciones para ofrecer a los clientes.
Su objetivo es tener una fuente de ingreso constante para ayudar a su joven familia, e ir progresando juntos para alcanza una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Brayan is employed and he also sells clothing. He lives with his wife and 6-year-old daughter and works everyday starting at 2:00pm at a funeral parlor. He spends the rest of his time selling clothing.

He currently needs to invest in merchandise, buying casual wear as well as women’s and children’s clothing. With this investment, he will be in a better condition to sell to his customers.

His goal is to have a constant source of income to support his young family and to continue moving forward together to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy casual wear and women's and children's clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her crops.

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
José tiene 36 años de edad, el es casado y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad. Vive en casa propia la cual esta  ubicada e una comunidad pequeña del distrito de Chepen.

José se dedica a  brindar servicio de transporte público en una mototaxi (moto con cabina para transportar personas) que es su propiedad durante la semana de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana se dedica la venta de verduras en el mercado  de su localidad. Su esposa lo ayuda al sostenimiento del hogar con la venta de comida, actividad a la a que se dedica hace 8 años.

José está  solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500  nuevos soles para poder realizar un mantenimiento a su unidad móvil, con sus respectivas actualizaciones de documentos y para comprar más mercadería para su negocio de verduras.
texts.en:
José is 36 years old, and is married with two young children.  He lives in his own house which is located in a small community in Chepén district.

During the week, from Monday to Friday, José works providing public transport with a mototaxi (a motorcycle with a cab for transporting people), which is his property.  Weekends are spent selling vegetables at the market in his area.  His wife helps him with the household by selling food, an activity that she has been working in for 8 years.

José is requesting a loan through Alternative Edpyme of 2,500 New Soles to perform maintenance on his mototaxi, with the relevant updated documents, and to buy more merchandise for his vegetable business.

loans.use: to maintain his mototaxi.

loans.name: Melida

texts.es:
Melida, se dedica a la venta de hot dog, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 16 años, ella aprendió a preparar la venta junto a su esposo desde hace 11 años, recorren varias calles ofreciendo la venta desde las 8:00am a 5:30 pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales, repollo, aderezos, salchichas, jamón, servilletas y polipel, con esta compra espera producir más.
Su objetivo es crecer en las ventas, pagar las deudas y velar por su familia.
texts.en:
Melida lives with her husband and 16-year-old son and works selling hot dogs.  She learned to prepare them to sell with her husband eleven years ago and they travel to various streets selling from 8am to 5:30pm.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials like cabbage, seasonings, hot dogs, ham, napkins and bags.  She hopes to produce more with this purchase.

Her goal is to grow in sales, pay off her debts and watch over her family.

loans.use: to buy cabbage, seasonings, hot dogs, ham, napkins and bags.

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 48 años de edad,  ella tiene 2 hijas mayores de edad, actualmente no cuenta con carga familiar directa, blanca con casa propia la cual está ubicada en una zona rural del distrito de Chiclayo.

Blanca Ella cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual es atendida por ella misma, hace 3 años. Allí ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes, haci como también bebidas, el negación tiene buena cogida y en este tiempo a conseguido tener clientela fija.

Blanca está  solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles  para que pueda acondicionar un espacio de sus casa solo para la venta de cerveza, cuales tienen muy buen nivel de ventas los fines de semanas.

Blanca es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carácter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 48, has two grown children.  She does not currently have any dependent relatives.  Blanca has her own house, which is located in a rural area in the Chiclayo district.  

Blanca has a small general store set up in her house.  She has been taking care of it herself for three years.  She sells to her neighbors and customers in the area.  She sells diverse daily consumption products, basic needs products, and groceries.  She also sells drinks.  The business is well received, and she has managed to get regular customers.

Blanca is requesting a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will use the loan to set up a space in her house solely for the sale of beer.  There is a good level of beer sales on the week-ends.

Blanca is a very hard-working woman and is of good moral character.  The people who know her hold her in high esteem and are fond of her.

loans.use: to fix up a space in her business in order to sell beer.

loans.name: Maria Emilse

texts.es:
Maria tiene 33 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus 05 hijos menores de edad.  Cuenta con casa propia la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Charan Coposo en el distrito de Tambogrande en Piura. Maria vive en la parte rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.

Maria se dedica a la  comercialización de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y además de ovejas, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio,  los cuales son muy espaciosos.

Este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Piura, esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 6 años, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio. También se dedica a la agricultura, junto a su esposo trabajan su parcela que han heredado de sus padres, en dicha parcela cuenta con limón el cual lo cosechan semanalmente.

Maria está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado.  

Maria desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
María, age 33, lives with her husband and their five minor children.  She has her own house in Charan Coposo, a rural community in the Tambogrande district in Piura.  Even though María lives in the rural part of the district, she does have electricity.

María sells small farm animals, a variety of poultry, and sheep.  She raises them in pens, which are very spacious, behind her home.  She carries out her business at the Piura market.  She has been doing this for over six years.  She has acquired experience in the field, and she has a fixed customer base in her business.

She also devotes herself to agriculture.  Together with her husband, she works the plot of land that they inherited from their parents.  This plot has lemons, which they harvest weekly.

María is requesting a loan for 1,5000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She will be able to buy animals and balanced feed with the loan.

María wishes to improve her quality of life through effort and work.  She has good work references.  The people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy animals and balanced feed.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio tiene de 65 años de edad, el es casado, vive con sus esposa y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo 2 están a su cargo. Gregorio cuenta con casa propia la cual está ubicada en el distrito de Reque a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Gregorio se dedica a la  elaboración de adobes y ladrillos, los cuales están hechos a base de barro con pajilla, estos materiales  son utilizados para la elaboración de casas o diferentes ambientes de estructura rustica, Gregorio los elabora y posteriormente los vende por millares o cientos, en algunas ocasiones elabora sus productos de acuerdo a pedidos.  Esta actividad la realiza hace más de 20 años en los que a obtenido experiencia en el rubro y en los que a conseguido clientela fija para sus negocio.
 
Gregorio está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de   nuevos soles para que pueda comprar 3 camionada de pajilla, y de esta manera pueda realizar una mayor cantidad de adobes 

Gregorio es un padre entregado a su trabajo muy responsable, y honesto, su más grande anhelo es poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gregorio, age 65, is married and lives with his wife.  He has seven children, but only two are under his care.  Gregorio has his own house, which is located in the Reque district 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Gregorio makes sun-dried bricks and fired bricks. They are made from a base of mud with straw.  These materials are used to build houses or different structures made from simple, rustic materials.  Gregorio makes them and later sells them by the thousands or hundreds.  Sometimes he makes his products according to orders.  He has been doing this for over 20 years.  During that time he has gained experience in the field, and he has gotten a customer base for his business.

Gregorio is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternative for 1,300 soles.  He will use the loan to buy three truckloads of straw.  That way he will be able to make a greater quantity of bricks.

Gregorio is a father who is dedicated to his work.  He is very responsible and honest.  His greatest desire is to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make bricks.

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isidora; ella tiene 30 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes platos, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m en el mercado del distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.       
                                                         
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the ‘Munay Tika’ Communal Bank. It is located in the District of Urubamba, which is part of the Province of Urubamba and the Department of Cusco.

Isadora is 30 years old, has a live-in partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with her food sales business where she prepares different dishes. She works from 8am to 4pm at the market in the District of Urubamba. She wants to expand and improve her food sales business and is requesting a loan to buy products to cook such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy products to cook such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Mereyda

texts.es:
Mereyda tiene 49 años de edad, ella es soltera y tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad.  Ella cuenta con casa propia   la cual está ubicada en el caserío llamado  Corral de arena  en el distrito de Olmos. Mereyda vive en la parte rural de este distrito, pero aun haci cuenta con los servicios básicos  (agua y luz).

Mereyda  se dedica a la  comercialización de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y además de ovejas, los cuales cría en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio,  esta actividad la aprendió de sus padre y desde hace 5 años ella a realiza sus ventas en el mercado de Piura y también realiza entregas en su domicilio. En todos estos años mereyda ha adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.

Mereyda  está solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000  nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado.  Además ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cría a sus  animales. 

Mereyda desea mejorar su calidad  de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Mereyda is 49 years old, she is single and has 2 adult children.  She has her own house which is located in the hamlet called Corral de Arena in the Olmos district.  Mereyda lives in the rural part of this district, but she still has basic services (water and electricity).

Mereyda works in the business of small animals, various poultry and also sheep, which she raises in pens located behind her home.  She learned this activity from her father.  5 years ago she started selling at the market in Piura and she also makes home deliveries.  In all these years, Mereyda has gained experience and established a client base for her business.

Mereyda is requesting a loan of 1,000 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa to be able to buy animals together with their respective animal feed.  In addition she wants to make improvements to their pens, to improve the environment in which she is raising her animals.

Mereyda want to improve her quality of life with effort and hard work.   She has good work references, and people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible woman.

loans.use: to buy animals with their respective animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: improve and install a roof for his house.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva tiene 47 años, vive con 2 de sus 4 hijos  en su casa que es propia. Casi toda su vida ha estado ligada a las actividades  agrícolas, pero hace 16 años empezó con la ganadería, ya que las vacas que posee le proporcionan gran cantidad de leche, que los lleva a vender a una fábrica de lácteos, que se encuentra cerca de su vivienda. Es así que sus vacas producen 60 litros leche diariamente, y por tal recibe buena cantidad de dinero. Por otro lado, vende también los becerros machos, así se genera más ingresos. En ocasiones sus hijos la apoyan en esta actividad, asimismo la apoyan en la siembra de papa y maíz,  pero lo hacen en menos extensiones de terreno, pues lo cosechado es utilizado para su consumo propio. Eva sabe lo rentable que le ha resultado la venta de leche, por ello desea su ayuda con un pequeño préstamo para pueda ampliar su establo y mejorar su infraestructura. Este será su crédito número 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su apoyo para que pueda cumplir sus objetivos, asimismo asegura que será muy responsable en sus cuotas. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de remedios para sus vacas y también semilla de pastizales para sembrar en sus terrenos y tener forraje para alimentar a sus vacas.
texts.en:
Eva is 47 years old and lives with two of her four children in a house she owns. She has been farming almost all her life, but also ventured into the livestock business 16 years ago when she began selling excess milk produced by her cows to a local dairy. Her cows produce 60 liters of milk a day, which generates a lot of income. She also earns revenue from the sale of male calves. 

Occasionally, Eva's children help her with her livestock business and farm. They grow potato and maize, but mostly for the family's consumption. Most of the land is dedicated to the dairy business because it is more profitable. She is applying for a small loan to expand and improve her stables. 

This will be Eva's third loan from MFP and she hopes to again receive the institution's financing. She is able to meet all requirements and will responsibly repay the loan. With the loan capital, Eva will buy medication for her dairy cows as well as grass seed to cultivate pasture land for grazing.

loans.use: To buy medicine for her cows as well as grass seed to plant a pasture for grazing.

loans.name: Denis De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Denis pequeño comerciante, se dedica a la elaboración de persianas de vidrio y metal, venta de ropa, con más de cinco años, trabajando en su negocio propio. Desde joven aprendió el oficio, lo que trabajaba en una fábrica. Atreves de ahorro y préstamo logra comprar herramientas para comenzar hacer su trabajo propio.
Así como mejora a su vivienda, en donde se le ha hecho posible mediantes estos financiamiento.
Con este nuevo préstamo comprara: aluminio, vidrio, y otros materiales para hacer ventana y seguir cumpliendo con su demanda,  así como sus compromisos con la familia, y otros gastos.
texts.en:
Denis, a small businessman, makes window blinds from glass and metal, and he sells clothing. He has been working in his own business for more than five years. He learned this trade as a youth, when he worked in a factory. Through his savings and a loan he managed to buy tools to begin doing his own work.

In addition, he is improving his house, which has been made possible through these loans.

With this new loan he will buy aluminum, glass, and other materials to make windows and continue filling his orders. He will also fulfull his obligations to his family and pay for other expenses.

loans.use: to buy glass and aluminum to continue filling his orders for window blinds.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rufina; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta al por mayor, ella vende manzanas, naranjas, plátanos, uvas y mandarinas y lo distribuye en los diferentes mercados del distrito de Urubamba, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor. 
                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Munay Tika." The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which belongs to the Urubamba province and the department of Cusco.

She is Sra. Rufina. She is 44 years old and is married with four children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling fruit wholesale. She sells apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, and mandarins, and she distributes them in different markets in the district of Urubamba. Through this business, she is raising her family. She wants to expand her fruit-selling business. She is applying for the loan to buy more fruit wholesale.

This bank member is happy to have the loan and she promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to buy more fruit wholesale.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma; ella tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, aceite, leche y golosinas.
                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Munay Tika." The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

She is Sra. Vilma. She is 34 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has three children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, oil, and milk. She works from 7 am to 8 pm. Through her business, she is raising her children. She wants to expand and improve her grocery story. She is applying for the loan to buy products such as rice, oil, milk, and sweets.

She is happy to have the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, oil, milk, and sweets

loans.name: Reluz Miñope Paulita

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 55 años de edad, vive con su esposo  y 02 hijas que están
en edad escolar. Su vivienda está ubicada en un caserío llamado valle hermoso en el distrito de  Monsefú, que es una pequeña comunidad rural que está ubicada a 40 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Esta zona se caracteriza por dedicarse a la agricultura y ganadería.

Paulina desde hace 20 años se dedica ala crianza de ganado vacuno, labor que le permite obtener ingresos de la venta de leche, la cual realiza en sus comunidad u en zonas cercanas a su comunidad. También se dedica a la artesanía (elaboración de sombreros de paja y palma), de la cual también percibe pequeños ingresos Estas actividades le permiten solventar algunos gastos diarios del hogar, ya que lo que gana su esposo como peón agrícola no es suficiente, para cubrir los gastos familiares.

Los pastos para alimentación de ganado han escaseado por lo que se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de S/.1000 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de alfalfa y alimento balanceado para su ganado y por consiguiente una mayor producción de leche.

Su más grande sueño es darles a sus hijas una educación de calidad,  Paulina es una madre de familia muy trabajadora y responsable, cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus amigos y vecinos.
texts.en:
Paulina is 55 years old, and lives with her ​​husband and 2 school-age daughters.

Her house is located in a village called Valle Hermoso (Beautiful Valley) in the Monsefú district.  It is a small rural community that is located 40 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. This area is characterized by agriculture and livestock breeding.

Paulina has been raising dairy cattle for 20 years.  This work allows her to earn income from the sale of milk, which she sells in her community or in areas close to her community. She also works in handicrafts (making sombreros from straw and palm), from which she also earns a small income.  These activities allow her to manage some of the daily household expenses, as what her husband earns as an agricultural laborer is not enough to cover the family expenses.

Pastures for feeding the cattle have been scarce, which is why she has seen it necessary to apply for a loan through Edpyme Alternativea for 1,000  New Soles.  The money will be invested in the purchase of alfalfa and balanced feed for her livestock, therefore resulting in increased milk production.

Her biggest dream is to give her daughters a quality education.  Paulina is a hardworking and responsible mother, who has good references from her friends and neighbors.

loans.use: to buy feed for her animals and materials for making her products.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MUNAY TIKA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra.
